object.field: Where Nestor waits for the effects of the test batch on their asian consumers.

Sparrow, a long time ago supported Fenris to be the Alpha in the Heart of battle. He had the last vote, and thanks to him Falcon and Father Thunder were beaten. Fenris kept is promise and welcomed the small bird in his brood. But no get of Fenris pack even dared asking the small bird for animal token. Now, no one even knows that Sparrow is from the brood of Fenris.

During a battle in human form, there are great chances against the Sabbat that there will be casualties among the players. This scene is to be played after Krieg has been mortally wounded. He is lying incapacited in a coridor, his back against the wall, barely conscious and pressing his chest wound. Let the player think he is going to die. After a while, he woke up still in the same condition. He might think that it's his last breath. He is now in the Umbra and time has stopped. A small bird has come to see him, eating a few grains of rice on the floor. After what seems to be an eternity, the chirping of the bird become understandable speech. He ask Krieg if his mission is over. If he has reached his purpose in life. If not (probably not), the small bird declares that he is a great warrior among the brood of mighty warriors, but that he neither has reached his purpose in life, obtaining full membership of the brood of Fenris by being supported by one of his children. As he sees their mutual benefices, sparrows make a proposal: let's have both of them a chance to fulfill their destiny.
Sparrow becomes an Ally (1) of the character that a earns a Fetish (3) background as well.

Krieg japanese bow will be turned into a fetish by sparrow. This fetish is hidden as a tatoo on the heart on all forms. By passing a gnosis check, the sparrow bow reveals itself (automatically in the Umbra). It's a normal bow that needs arrows to be fired. However, by succeeding a gnosis roll (DV 6), it's possible with this bow to fire a mystic arrow. If the number of success indicate the quality of the hit. A mystical arrow, built from the being of Gaia will endure no obstacle between itself and the Wyrm. Arrows fired with the Sparrow bow do aggravated damage.

While Arjan is dealing with delivery of his new car, Sarah goes to the Pinakotheka to see the expo. Inside the expo is a central room that can only be reached through the Umbra. This room is the consequence of the actions of Century the Marauder.
A garou will automatically step sideways by reaching the glass walls around the room. In the penumbra, all spirits will stay hidden to watch the actions of whoever enter the room.

Before arriving to the pinakotheka, Sarah and Arjan will witness a terrible storm that will last a few minutes. The storm is closely centered around the Pinakotheka, but it is not easy to realize that (Wits+Science). This is the mundane consequence of what just happened in the Umbra.

This place is the result of the victory of Century the Marauder against the Epsilon Mechanoid. When the High Wizard destoyed the Iteration, it fell into pieces, quickly melting to the environment. The quintessence flow was absorbed by the place in the Umbra, thus strenghtening all spirits in slumber. Among them, Brunhilde came up to life and called for an immediate meeting of her court.
In the center of the Pinakotheka, the gauntlet strength is 0 and will come back to 3 at the rate of 1 per moon cycle.The sleepers around are feeling some comfort around and will probably will be more present for the next couple of months.
As only Gaian spirits where presents during the event, only Brunhilde and her court were strengthened by the battle, and thus spirits of the weaver and the wyrm are only lurking from some distance.
A waitress did not checked in this morning.

The players at this time should had contacted the Police due to what they witnessed during the night. If they didn't, the Police will come to them. Detective Stravinstki is the one responsible of the situation. Two guys will be there however, one from the secret services and one from the MAD. A third character, the psychanalist Louisa Shermann will be there to assist the witnesses if they feel ill at ease.
Where the bad guys send their first kindred to Oktoberfest to see if the magic works.
Sabbat implication in the events during the Wiesn make no doubt. The Prince decides there must be consequences.
The nosferatu of the underworld, answering to the Elder Bismark had eye witnesses of the Swords operation on the road to Innsbruck. The Primogen Council has been gathered.

Ursula Eidenstadt has become Prince of Munich following the actions of the Sabbat on the City thirty years ago. Some, among the Toreador, Brujah and the Tremere would gladly let her meet the final death if for whatever reason proof was given she worked with the Sabbat to obtain such a promotion.
The Toreador and Brujah have lost their primogens and other elders during the fight, and the tremere are the ones who really had contacts with the sabbat, such a situation is than understandable.
And the first to understand that is Ursula. She genuinely hates the sabbat, but she spent even more resources on this witch hunt to prove herself legit has the Prince of Munich.
Ludmilla Obermann, and Elder Ventrue has been chosen to watch sabbat activity during Oktoberfest. This is not a replacement to what is actually done every year, but a reinforcement.
Blood Shopping At The Bus Stop
The even happen at 4:30 AM. The bus goes from Innsbruck S√ºdbahnstra√üe to Munich Central Bus Station. It's a FlixBus. It's supposed to arrive at 6:15 AM. The trip is 13.99‚Ç¨ with VAT
Where the first nine shovelheads to be are separated from the other. The Sabbat plans for having loss, they will need 7 shovel heads so 2 people are added to the bloodlust. Safety first.
This year, Vidar is Security Contact Officer for Oktoberfest. It's double pay, but much more responsibility and much more meetings. This is the first of them.

Vidar learns about the missing waitress, a girl named Brigid Strauss, presented as Miss B. Strauss. Few time later, Brunhilde comes to him to say that she is late.
The SCO, about 30 guys, are introduced to Detective Karl Steiner, the guy in charge from the Lander police. Once again, he hopes he will be useless, but he cares about drug activites and wants the SCO to keep both eyes opened on the subject. Fabio Fenzi, an italian maffioso is known to operate in the sector since a few monthes, and he wants to keep Fenzi guys out of the game. Steiner introduce his assistant on the matter from the italian DIS, Federica Marzzi.
Piotr Stravinski is present during this meeting but is not introduced. It appears anyway has a field detective, and not the kind of guy to mess with.

As a ghoul of the Prince, Stravinski is her eyes and ears at daytime. A couple centuries old, most shovelheads or sabbat neonates should not be a threat to him. He is among the few characters in the story that has, as a complement to the standard GSG9 ordinance (the German SWAT) a 1943 .45 English revolver loaded with plain silver bullets. He can be a good ally in fight against supernatural creatures)
This is for you Mrs Bommer
At Mr and Mrs Bommer house

The missing neighbourgh, Mrs Paola Bommer was among the passengers of the Innsbruck Bus. She has been turned into a shovelhead by the sabbat pack. She managed to escape them (she was a late riser), and, freaked out and disoriented, she tried to go back to familiar grounds.... and came back home to see her beloved husband.
Avoid Paola killing to many innocent people. Avoid her getting killed.
A member of the company of Leopold will see the cooperation with a demon a line that cannot be crossed.
Mrs Bommer, if it is possible to calm a thurst for human blood, might willingly cooperate. She knows where she has been killed and remembers who did that. She doesn't know the names exactly, but
Mr Bommer or the Tilmanns could be killed if the PC do not intervene.
The garou nation obtains the deal with the preceptor...
From A Cricket Point Of View...
Marcy has an old recipe that she call her Irisish Aunty Verbal Tea. Really efficient against fever.
The activists of the AfD (Alternativ f√ºr Deutschland), right wing neonazi extremists are the diversion put there by the Sabbat to keep people busy (the Camarilla in particular).
Wreck havoc and do maximum damage.

The Camarilla is ready for that. It will not intervene in an instant, but after 15 minutes the Nosferatu of the Underworld will be there to take care of those petty humans. They will be supported by a GSG9 team. It's important to notice that the guns used by the nosferatus are the same ordinance that the ones used by the GSG9 cops.
